DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics ABT-384 elderly subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics ABT-384 Elderly Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 65 year great 2 . Judged condition general good health base result medical history , physical examination , vital sign , laboratory profile 12lead ECG 1 . Use protocolprohibited medication within 2 week prior study drug administration . 2 . Positive urine drug screen nonprescribed drug abuse include alcohol . 3 . Receipt drug depot injection within 30 day prior study drug administration . 4 . Receipt investigational product within 6 week prior study drug administration . 5 . History significant sensitivity allergy drug . 6 . History drug alcohol abuse within 2 year . 7 . Positive test result HBV , HCV HIV . 8 . Estimated creatinine clearance < 30 mL/min . 9 . Donation loss 5 mL/kg blood volume receipt blood product within 8 week prior study drug administration . 10 . Current enrollment another clinical study .
